name: European Information Society Institute, o.z.
goal: EISi is a Slovak-based non-profit organization focusing on the overlap of technology, law & information society. It also serves as a non-academic research center for Internet law and Intellectual Property law.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Development, Education, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
- Digital Single Market
- Intellectual Property
- Copyright Law
- IPR Enforcement
- General Data Protection Regulation
- Interoperability & Standards
